Class TreeNode

A node in a tree structure.

Method Details

__init__(self, parent)
(Constructor)

source code 

Construct a new TreeNode

If parent is not `None`, then the new node will be automatically added to the tree structure.

Parameters:
  • parent - The parent of this node, or `None` for the root of a tree.
Overrides: object.__init__

ascendTree(self)

source code 

Generator returning the nodes of the tree encountered while ascending from the current node to the root node.

E.g. for the tree:

       A
      /               B   C
    / \               D   E   F

D.ascendTree() would return a generator yielding D, B, A.

Returns:
A generator that returns the nodes of the tree encountered while ascending from the current node to the root.

preorderTraversal(self, preFunc=None, postFunc=None, condition=<function <lambda> at 0x7faab17ba550>)

source code 

Perform a pre-order depth-first traversal of the tree structure.

The traversal will start from this node. At each node traversed, callback functions will be called with the current node as the only argument.

Parameters:
  • preFunc - Function to call before traversing to the next node.
  • postFunc - Function to call after traversing the child nodes.
  • condition - Condition that nodes must meet to be included.
Returns:
A generator that returns the nodes of the (sub-)tree rooted at this joint, that meet the given condition, in depth first pre-order.
